token.description: A secret token used to validate the assent

name.description: The name of this assent is displayed as a title to end users and should make clear what they are assending to

description.description: The description of this assent is displayed to end users as additional information and should make clear what they are assending to

request.description: The request that this assent applies to

forwardUrl.description: The request that this assent applies to

property.description: The property of a request that this assent applies to e.g. partner in meldingvoorgenomenhuwelijk

process.description: The process that this assent originated from

contact.description: The contact that this assent applies to

status.description: The status of this assent e.g. requested, granted, declined, cancelled, withdrawn

requester.description: The organisation (RSIN) or person (BSN) that is responsible for making this assent
